name: departmental-store
description: This will be our backend service from departmental store on line application
author: ThiagoNascimento

scripts.dev: npm run services:up && npm run services:wait:postgres && npm run migrations:up && node --watch src/server.js
scripts.test: npm run services:up && npm run services:wait:postgres && npm run migrations:up && (concurrently -n fastify,jest --hide fastify --success first -k "node src/server.js" "node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --runInBand --verbose"); npm run services:down
